blog.name: bixbiboom
blog.title: I myself am also Enchanter Pumat Sol
blog.description:
Bixbi, older than you.

Fat queer of indeterminate origin.

Possibly a lesser demon.

Hellenist serving Hestia, Hermes and Chiron.

Critical Role has taken over my life and my blog.

Taliesin Jaffe is my boyfriend.

I love you.

#eyesnevershut

blog.name: captain-narava-felidae-riggs
blog.title: The tide has washed the nice from me
blog.description: WOW/SWTOR. Captain Narava of both worlds. Goblin. My hobbies include: Crying while watching hockey, crying while watching Critical Role, and crying while watching Glee clips on YouTube. Also knitting. Over 40 and cool with it. Perniciously Aneimic, hella anxious, depressed widow, biromantic demisexual . Slytherin. OTP: Narava/Corso, Alt OTP: Avarane/Corso, Completely different fandom otp: Perc'ahlia. Pens/Stanley Cup. She/her. Unless you’re Taliesin Jaffe, I’m not interested.

summary: I know everyone’s talking about the pregnancy timing but I just want to take this moment to put forward the idea of the M9 at...
body: I know everyone’s talking about the pregnancy timing but I just want to take this moment to put forward the idea of the M9 at some point running across a party that’s made up of twin quarter elves, a half-tiefling, twin aasimars a few years older then others, and maybe also the half-elf child of a cleric of the raven queen and a fighter who’s more bluff than skill

Come for the Critical Role and other fandom stuff...stay for (not so vague) leftist/socialist propoganda, sadness, and shitty memes.

summary: Finally watching The Search for Grog, a few early notes: - Laura Bailey. That’s all. She came onto stage in that jacket/skirt...
body:
Finally watching The Search for Grog, a few early notes:

- Laura Bailey. That’s all. She came onto stage in that jacket/skirt combo and *harp music*

- I would die for Bertrand Bell.

- Sam Riegel and Liam O’Brien are monsters. I love them both to tears, but the skeleton gag? Sam you’re a bad person. Making your character a follower of the Raven Queen? You’re just as bad, O’Brien.

reblog.comment:

summary: Vax: "Percy, you keep saying things like "inside the mirror" and "the world of the mirror", but there's no such world inside...
body:
Vax: “Percy, you keep saying things like "inside the mirror” and “the world of the mirror”, but there’s no such world inside there.“

*FLASHBACK TO THE FUTURE*

Fjord: "Yasha? Yasha? Caduceus, where is she?”

Caduceus: “She’s been taken into the mirror world by Oban”

Fjord: “But caduceus, there’s no such thing as a world inside the mirror-”

Caduceus: “Say. That. One. More. Fucking. Time. The last people who said that got KILLED maybe probably.”

Fjord: “Oh come on, what are the chances of us meeting someone like that?” (Wheely High)

Caduceus: “There’s no telling what kind of horrors she’s facing right now.”

Yasha: “Oh, well this isn’t so bad OHMYGODTHEYSPELLEDTRASHBACKWARDS”

Caduceus: “So don’t you ever say that again”

Fjord: “…you smell nice”

tags: either lady vex'ahlia de rolo has an ironclad womb or that embryo is at most two weeks old
and i'd rather assume vex is a very early bloomer
tagging just to be safe since i know this can be very upsetting for people to hear talked about
summary: yeah, i'm gonna assume that vex got pregnant on the night after the vecna fight at the earliest, and is just showing signs of it...
body:
yeah, i’m gonna assume that vex got pregnant on the night after the vecna fight at the earliest, and is just showing signs of it extraordinarily fast because the alternative would be that she, among other things:

  • drank
  • turned into a dragon
  • was destroyed by divine fire and cast anew in glorious light
  • died

while pregnant, and while i’m by no means an expert on what a cluster of cells comprising an embryo can or cannot take on the chin, i can’t imagine that would an ideal situation.
